Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
This is the name of a skill - i.e. something you research from the tech tree.

“Orbital Relays provide vital support to winning a war. In truth, war is all logistics. Well-supplied troops can contain a whole countryside seething with rebellion. And one slip-up can be fatal. If troops run out of ammo, are hungry, can’t wipe their backsides, or their body armor is in a crate on a shipping dock instead of at the front lines, they’re as good as dead.”[br/]– Darcy Pinker, Quartermaster General
“轨道中继站为赢得战争提供了至关重要的支持。事实上，打仗拼的就是后勤。供应充足的军队能够遏制住一整个叛乱的乡村。然而，哪怕一次失误也可能让人丧命。如果部队弹尽粮绝，自身难保，或者连他们的武器装备都不在前线，而是还放在箱子里或者码头上，那他们和死人也没什么差别了。”[br/]- 达西·平克，军需处长

This is a skill description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a skill - i.e. something you research from the tech tree.

“Unless you want to leave them behind, please keep your limbs inside the dropship until it comes to a complete stop. Upon arrival, please empty the contents of your stomach into the bag in the seat pocket in front of you. Sure, Orbital Relay is fast, but it’s normal to take a day to recuperate from the experience. Should a malfunction happen during your journey, we will make no effort to find your remains, as they are probably atomized somewhere in outer space.”[br/]– Dwelp Salterman, Orbital Relay Operator
“在运输船完全停稳之前，请勿把手脚探出船外，除非你不想要它们了。抵达地点后，请座位前面口袋里的呕吐物清理干净。确实，轨道中继运输很快，但通常需要用上一天的时间来恢复。如果你在旅途中发生了什么意外，我们将尽可能地找到你的残肢，虽然它们可能已经在太空中的某个地方蒸发了。”[br/]- 德韦尔普·萨尔特曼，轨道中继站操作员

This is a skill description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
This is the name of a skill - i.e. something you research from the tech tree.

Unlocks the ability to upgrade Forward Bases into Forward Relays, this lets them be used like an [abilityblue]Orbital Relay[/abilityblue] sector and grants them a [abilityblue]Tier 3 Garrison[/abilityblue].
解锁将前线基地升级为前线中继站的能力，升级之后的前线中继站将拥有与[abilityblue]轨道中继站[/abilityblue]区域相同的功能且配备有 [abilityblue]3 阶驻防[/abilityblue]。

This is a skill description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
